title: Criss Angel Cancels Appearances After Son's Cancer Diagnosis
text:
Criss Angel Cancels Appearances After Son's Cancer Diagnosis 
Published By: JustJared.com - Today 
Criss Angel has cancelled his upcoming performances in light of the news that his one-year-old son Johnny is battling cancer. The 47-year-ol...
